mapper.select: select student_no,name ,sex,phone,qq,wechat, class_name,department_name,school_name from t_student left outer join t_class_info on t_student.class_id = t_class_info.class_id left outer join t_department on t_class_info.department_id = t_department.department_id left outer join t_school on t_department.school_code = t_school.school_code ${ew.customSqlSegment}
